mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your needs come first, second, and third!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, get this-my neighbor had the audacity to ask me to turn down the volume on my annual rooftop party because it was "disturbing the peace." Can you believe it? Me, the king of social gatherings, being told to quiet down in my own domain! Well, I turned that dial all the way up to max volume and blasted "We Are the Champions" on repeat for the next 12 hours straight. Who's disturbing the peace now, huh? That'll teach 'em to mess with Hot Josh!
